# sophie 𓐟 𓐠 𓋷 < 𓁷 𓁶 𓄂 schopf

𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓏤 | sophie doctrine, teaching | ⲥⲁⲃⲟ ⲥⲃⲱ 𒇴 ešēbu uššubu ⇔ 𒍪 zu

σοφῐ́η sophíē Ionic
σοφίᾱ sophíā “high knowledge”: “learning”, “wisdom”.
σοφός sophós “skilled, clever”

𓇽 ≈ 𒁲 sa₂ sapience 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 sophie "intelligence"
𓇽 ≈ 𒁲 sa₂ sapience 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 саве́т savjét soviet "advice, counsel; resolution"
